price: 26. ¡Al-lah! No existe nada ni nadie con derecho a ser adorado excepto Él, el Señor del Gran Trono”.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
